meanings.definition: The sound made by a horse's hoof striking the ground.
meanings.sent1: The loud hoofbeat echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the rhythmic hoofbeat of the horse approaching.
meanings.sent3: The hoofbeat of the horse sounded like a drumbeat in the quiet forest.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced to the hoofbeat of the approaching horse.
meanings.sent5: The thundering hoofbeat of the stallion left a lasting impression on me.
